11449b98-b3ae-4e3c-aa87-e6314d9c89d8.description: Earners of the FT Non-Executive Director Diploma have the skills required to be an effective non-executive director. These individuals have the skills and knowledge needed for any non-executive role, including legal liabilities and duties of a non-executive; the correct structure and operation of a board; audit and financial reporting; internal control and risk management; and they possess the behavioural skills needed to ensure an effective contribution to the board.
11449b98-b3ae-4e3c-aa87-e6314d9c89d8.name: FT Non-Executive Director Diploma - Pearson SRF BTEC Level 7 Advanced Professional Diploma

issuer.summary: issued by FT Board Director Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 6 month blended programme. The five modules are delivered online and designed to be studied at learners own pace. There are two workshops, attendance at which is compulsory, during the course. The first half day workshop provides an introduction to the course and the topics studied. The second two-day workshop concentrates on the all important issue of effective boardroom behaviour, both on an individual basis and providing an understanding of group dynamics (25 hours in total).

There are three assessments throughout: A Learning log to show candidates have reflected on, identified and started to address their own particular behavioural skills. A case study of 15,000 words based on a recent Annual report of a real company and a three hour controlled finance assessment.

6ddc8531-427a-4ea1-a8b3-e81766aec800.description: Earners of the FT Non-Executive Director Diploma have the skills required to be an effective non-executive director. These individuals have the skills and knowledge needed for any non-executive role, including legal liabilities and duties of a non-executive; the correct structure and operation of a board; audit and financial reporting; internal control and risk management; and they possess the behavioural skills needed to ensure an effective contribution to the board.
6ddc8531-427a-4ea1-a8b3-e81766aec800.name: FT Non-Executive Director Diploma Asia - Pearson SRF BTEC Level 7 Advanced Professional Diploma

issuer.summary: issued by FT Board Director Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 6 month blended programme. The five modules are delivered online and designed to be studied at learners own pace. There are two workshops, attendance at which is compulsory, during the course. The first half day workshop provides an introduction to the course and the topics studied. The second two-day workshop concentrates on the all important issue of effective boardroom behaviour, both on an individual basis and providing an understanding of group dynamics (25 hours in total).

There are three assessments throughout: A Learning log to show candidates have reflected on, identified and started to address their own particular behavioural skills. A case study of 15,000 words based on a recent Annual report of a real company and a three hour controlled finance assessment.

79aaedb0-c50d-4ddc-9e43-d36f3034f283.description: Earners of the So You Want to be a Non-Executive Director badge have an understanding of the role of a non-executive director including: the legal duties and how boards are structured. They will be familiar with the softer behavioural skills needed to enable them to make an effective contribution as a board member. This workshop counts for 6 CPD hours of structured learning.
79aaedb0-c50d-4ddc-9e43-d36f3034f283.name: FT Non-Executive Director Programme - So You Want to be a Non-Executive Director

issuer.summary: issued by FT Board Director Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a half day workshop which provides an understanding of the Legal responsibilities of a NED, with sessions covering corporate governance, an introduction to the roles of sub-committees, board structure and dynamics, life as an independent director and the opportunities and risks of being a non-executive director.
Case studies in break out groups covering Corporate Governance.

91ad35b4-025f-4ab9-bbfc-03d1223f6efa.description: Earners of the Effective Non-Executive Director badge have the knowledge needed for any non-executive role including: an understanding of the legal responsibilities of a non-executive director; the latest in corporate governance, the sub-committees and their roles, boardroom dynamics and the characteristics of effective boards. They will understand how to think strategically and to challenge appropriately as an independent director. This workshop counts as 14 CPD hours of structured learning.
91ad35b4-025f-4ab9-bbfc-03d1223f6efa.name: FT Non-Executive Director Programme - The Effective Non-Executive Director

issuer.summary: issued by FT Board Director Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 2 day intensive workshop. The first day provides an understanding of the Legal responsibilities of a NED, with sessions covering corporate governance and the roles of both the remuneration and audit committees. The second day concentrates on the all important issue of effective boardroom behaviour. Both days include interactive case studies.
Case studies in break out groups covering Corporate Governance, the sub-committees and the role of the Independent Director / Chair.

ddc8a421-cc15-42b8-a9a3-629b8c84ea1a.description: Earners of the Effective Non-Executive Director badge have the knowledge needed for any non-executive role including: an understanding of the legal responsibilities of a non-executive director; the latest in corporate governance, the sub-committees and their roles, boardroom dynamics and the characteristics of effective boards. They will understand how to think strategically and to challenge appropriately as an independent director. This workshop counts as 14 CPD hours of structured learning.
ddc8a421-cc15-42b8-a9a3-629b8c84ea1a.name: FT Board Director Programme - The Effective Non-Executive Director Asia

issuer.summary: issued by FT Board Director Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 2 day intensive workshop. The first day provides an understanding of the Legal responsibilities of a NED, with sessions covering corporate governance and the roles of both the remuneration and audit committees. The second day concentrates on the all important issue of effective boardroom behaviour. Both days include interactive case studies.
Case studies in break out groups covering Corporate Governance, the sub-committees and the role of the Independent Director / Chair.

31b0dbc5-a72b-4ec3-a820-b2e6e7208152.description: Earners of the So You Want to be a Non-Executive Director badge have an understanding of the role of a non-executive director including: the legal duties, how boards are structured and the role of the sub-committees. They will be familiar with the softer behavioural skills needed to enable them to make an effective contribution as a board member. This workshop counts for 5 CPD hours of structured learning.
31b0dbc5-a72b-4ec3-a820-b2e6e7208152.name: FT Board Director Programme - So You Want to be a Non-Executive Director Asia

issuer.summary: issued by FT Board Director Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a half day workshop which provides an understanding of the Legal responsibilities of a NED, with sessions covering corporate governance, an introduction to the roles of sub-committees, board structure and dynamics, life as an independent director and the opportunities and risks of being a non-executive director.
Case studies in break out groups covering Corporate Governance and the sub-committees.

4fc0cfce-ed4c-477d-908c-c7b532adf5ff.description: Earners of the Board Masterclass badge have board experience or are professionals who understand board structures and dynamics. They have engaged in an interactive workshop designed to provide a deeper insight into topics affecting organisations. This workshop counts for 5 CPD hours of structured learning.
4fc0cfce-ed4c-477d-908c-c7b532adf5ff.name: FT Non-Executive Director Programme - Board Masterclass

issuer.summary: issued by FT Board Director Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a half-day workshop which provides understanding on a topic that affects Board Directors in their duties. These topics have included Cyber Security, Digital Disruption, the Remuneration Committee and serving on International Boards.

dba494a3-7365-4a2a-b578-8112c1d988a4.description: Earners of the Corporate Governance badge have an understanding of the role of a non-executive director in the specific region including: corporate governance, the legal duties, how boards are structured and requirements for joining a board in the specific region.
dba494a3-7365-4a2a-b578-8112c1d988a4.name: FT Board Director Programme - Corporate Governance - China

issuer.summary: issued by FT Board Director Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 3.5-hour workshop which provides an understanding of the legal responsibilities of a NED, with sessions covering corporate governance, board structure and dynamics, life as an independent director and the opportunities and risks of being a non-executive director in the specific region.

75761bd2-99d9-4a78-82ab-0de0610497ef.description: Earners of the Professional Director Series badge have developed an understanding of the fundamentals of board effectiveness. By completing its constituent training courses, those who have the badge have engaged with matters of boards, how they are led, how they operate effectively, and the key issues facing board directors across different types of organisations. This represents 16 CPD hours of structured learning.
75761bd2-99d9-4a78-82ab-0de0610497ef.name: FT Board Director Online - Professional Director Series

issuer.summary: issued by FT Board Director Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 16 hour eLearning programme made up of the following courses: - The Role of the Board - The Role of a Board Member - Essential Financial Skills for Board Members - Culture, Strategy and the Board

c5be6dfc-cac3-4cea-9e62-3edf7f7f2f94.description: Earners of the Role of the Board badge have an understanding of what a board does, why its structured exists and how it operates. They will know how a board adds value to an organisation, and understand how to ensure the board committee system works well. They have a clear view of the different roles on a board and how they interact, therein understandind what part a board director plays in ensuring board effectiveness. This course counts for 4 CPD hours of structured learning.
c5be6dfc-cac3-4cea-9e62-3edf7f7f2f94.name: FT Board Director Online - The Role of the Board

issuer.summary: issued by FT Board Director Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 4 hour eLearning module, including final assessment, covering the following topics: What is the board for; What makes an effective board; Board committees; Key board positions (and relationships); Succession planning; and Board evaluation.

3cbea599-37d2-431f-85e3-9d53e89ca8a7.description: Earners of the Culture, Strategy and the Board badge understand how culture plays a significant role in shaping a board’s performance and is a growing priority for boardrooms. This analysis of board strategy equips participants with the tools to develop an impactful strategic framework and an understanding of how to navigate cultural disruptions to respond effectively at business level. This course counts for 4 CPD hours of structured learning.
3cbea599-37d2-431f-85e3-9d53e89ca8a7.name: FT Board Director Online - Culture, Strategy and the Board

issuer.summary: issued by FT Board Director Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 4 hour eLearning module, including final assessment, covering the following topics: Tone from the top; What does a good strategy look like; The board’s role in developing strategy; and implementing the strategy.

816b6ae5-f54d-4f16-a25d-20075c8a60d5.description: Earners of the Essential Financial Skills for Board Members badge know how to form a distinct picture of the health of an organisation based on key financial data and inform better decision making to drive a company’s performance. They have a solid foundation in finance and accounting from a board-level perspective. This course counts for 4 CPD hours of structured learning.
816b6ae5-f54d-4f16-a25d-20075c8a60d5.name: FT Board Director Online - Essential Financial Skills for Board Members

issuer.summary: issued by FT Board Director Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 4 hour eLearning module, including final assessment, covering the following topics: Background and accounting thresholds; Key financial statements; Key ratios; Off-balance sheet financing; Management and financial accounts; Business funding and investment appraisal; Shareholder value; and working with auditors.

skills.name: Finance And Accounting For Nonfinancial Managers

7b75597f-82c2-48a5-b74a-04fd21316e52.description: Earners of the Role of a Board Member badge have developed the required skills and knowledge to carry out the role of a Board Member successfully, whether as an executive or non-exec. They understand the principles of corporate governance and the specific duties, legal responsibilities and liabilities associated with being a board director. This course counts for 4 CPD hours of structured learning.
7b75597f-82c2-48a5-b74a-04fd21316e52.name: FT Board Director Online - The Role of a Board Member

issuer.summary: issued by FT Board Director Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 4 hour eLearning module, including final assessment, covering the following topics: Board structure; Director duties and liabilities; Corporate governance; Personal attributes of a board director; and Role of a board director.
